addBlock(int, int, int) - Method in class com.bartish.twentyfortyeight.actors.GameBoard

AddBlockException - Exception in com.bartish.twentyfortyeight.exceptions
An error is thrown if a Block cannot be placed in a certain position on a GameBoard

addRandomBlock() - Method in class com.bartish.twentyfortyeight.actors.GameBoard
